name: Power BI Desktop File
summary: A PBIX file is a document created by Power BI Desktop, a Microsoft application used to create reports and visualizations. It contains queries, data models, visualizations, settings, and reports added by the user.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: PBIX file open in Microsoft Power BI Desktop 2
images.alt: PBIX file open in Microsoft Power BI Desktop 2
